General.Name: Koan Hao Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and processes self-adhesive labels, industrial tapes, and other related products in Taiwan. It offers pressure sensitive labels, including water-based, solvent-based, hot melt type, etc. for commodity packaging and industrial purposes. The company also provides release papers, release films, and PE coated products; and polyimide protective films, polyester protective films, and OPP lamination tapes/transfer tapes. In addition, it offers industrial double-sided, electronics, and quad flat no-leads package tapes; and specialty tapes, including fiberglass tapes, UV tapes, thermal release tapes, and cooling stripping type protective films. It serves decorative, electronics and optoelectronics, automobiles, and consumer commodity industries. The company was formerly known as Koan Hao Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. in 2013. Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in Nantou City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 239, Chenggong 3rd Road, Nantou City, Taiwan, 54065
